meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a cult
meanings.sent1: The group's cultlike behavior raised concerns among outsiders.
meanings.sent2: The organization had a cultlike following that blindly followed its leader.
meanings.sent3: The cultlike devotion to the new smartphone model was amusing to observe.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with collecting vintage dolls bordered on cultlike.
meanings.sent5: The eerie chanting and rituals gave the gathering a cultlike atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics associated with a cult
meanings.sent1: The leader's cultlike control over his followers was concerning.
meanings.sent2: The movie's plot had a cultlike appeal to fans of the genre.
meanings.sent3: The cultlike fashion trend of wearing all black was surprisingly popular.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned mansion had a cultlike aura that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The group's strict rules and secrecy added to its cultlike mystique.
